name: Create OpenRC Service
description: Create, enable and start an OpenRC service for an npm package

parameters.name: Command
parameters.description: The command to run (also used as service and user name)

parameters.name: Command Line Arguments
parameters.description: Arguments for the command. Available variables: $HOME_DIR, $DATA_DIR, $SECURE_DIR

parameters.name: User ID
parameters.description: Optional user ID. Default is 0 (root). If not provided, the system will assign one automatically.

parameters.name: Group Name
parameters.description: Optional group name (will be created if not exists)

parameters.name: Owned Paths
parameters.description: Space-separated list of files/directories the user should own with rw access

parameters.name: Bind Privileged Port
parameters.description: Allow service to bind to privileged ports (e.g., 80, 443) by setting CAP_NET_BIND_SERVICE capability

commands.name: Create OpenRC Service
commands.description: Create user, service file, enable and start the service
